text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Today, the academy's tryout races<n>are being held. Whether
or not a<n>student can perform well enough to<n>get scouted
can significantly affect<n>their future.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Looking around, I spy heaps of other<n>trainers milling about,
from newbies to<n>veterans alike. Seems like<n>everyone's
got their eyes on those<n>two today.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I'll try my best out there today!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
So that's Daiwa Scarlet... She's<n>definitely got potential, I'll
say that!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
She kept a dominant lead after the<n>third turn in yesterday's
scrimmage...<n>meaning it's gonna be a tough fight<n>to
become her trainer. And huh,<n>there's her competition!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Sup.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I see. Vodka's doing a better job of<n>keeping her nerves in
check. Now, the<n>question is—who will prevail?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ...Hmph. As if we're even on the<n>same level.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Yo, I heard that. Heh, just don't come<n>crying to me later, all
right?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Oh, and just who do you think you're<n>talking to? I'm the
number one racer,<n>Daiwa Scarlet!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sparks are already flying between<n>these two promising
rookies. Looks<n>like this'll be a race to remember!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Bang!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: And they're off! The racers are out of<n>the gate!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And leading the pack—it's Daiwa<n>Scarlet! She's taken an
early lead with<n>her impressive speed!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
B-but is she going to be able to keep<n>up that pace?! Even
for her, this might<n>be a little...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Nah, if there's one thing you can<n>count on, it's that Daiwa
Scarlet's got<n>tons of fuel in the tank. Look again.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
The others are speeding up to try and<n>match her, but they
won't be able to<n>keep up that pace for long. All<n>according
to plan.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Daiwa Scarlet has held the lead since<n>the start of the race.
But coming into<n>the final stretch, a challenger appears!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Damn... I'm not—

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: —I'm not just gonna roll over and let<n>you win!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Vodka, rounding the final turn! Vodka,<n>giving chase! Daiwa
Scarlet is right in<n>front of her!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Tch?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Raaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Speed! Vodka is speed! An<n>astounding comeback! Vodka
and<n>Daiwa Scarlet are neck and neck!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Ugh... Ughhh! No... I won't let her!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Because—that number one spot is<n>mine!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Daiwa Scarlet, Vodka! Daiwa Scarlet,<n>Vodka! The finish line
is right there!<n>Your winner is—

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
—Vodka! It came down to the wire, but<n>Vodka takes first! In
second, Daiwa<n>Scarlet!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huff... Puff...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Woo... Heh-heh. Looks like I'm the<n>winner today, Scarlet!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey, wait!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: ...The hell? Thought she'd be a bit<n>cooler than that.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so, the tryouts end with Vodka as<n>the victor.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Later that evening...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant... No, this isn'tenough! More, I need more stamina!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Not like that, never again!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Eek?! Wh-who's there?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Wait, a trainer? I saw you at the<n>tryouts earlier...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
My apologies. I'm currently training,<n>so could I ask you to
leave?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I'm... a little busy beating my<n>good-for-nothing self into
shape.
choice_data_list: Isn't finishing second pretty amazing already?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Second best won't cut it! I HAVEto be number one!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Ah... S-sorry.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: At any rate, I'll be leaving now.<n>Excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Daiwa Scarlet. To her, nothing's more<n>important than being
number one.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And for some reason, I can't get her<n>out of my mind...
